sentences: "Dizzy" Dean Davidson is an American singer, guitarist, and drummer from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
He was a founding member, lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist of the glam metal band Britny Fox from 1985 to 1990.
The band disbanded in 1992 but reunited in 2000 without Davidson.
In 2010, Davidson attempted to reunite Britny Fox but did not get past the talking stage.
The band name, Britny Fox was named after the Welsh coat of arms of one of Davidson's 18th century ancestors.
In 2007, Davidson released a folk rock album called Drive My Karma.
